desc: Delivering fresh, cold-preserved skincare so you find your best glow and get the most out of your ritual. And while mini-fridges are great, just as you don't put old food in the fridge expecting it to un-spoil, the same holds true for skin care. Get fresh, use fresh. That's the Wild Ice way.

layout.text: Our daily vitamin C serum is designed to build your glow over time, so you look more radiant with every use.
